title: anyone realized that veigar can go 5 items tank and still 1 shot people?
body:
his passive + {{item:3089}}  + 5 tank items  = undying +  500+ ap which allows him to W-R one shot .

all you need to do is just play safe in early game  and rush deathcap first item  .
